title: Medicine
name: Prof. Dr. M.A Sattar
description: Prof. Dr. M. A. Sattar is a Medicine Specialist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine). He is a Professor in the Department of Medicine at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. M. A. Sattar at Popular Diagnostic Center, Chittagong is 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

title: Nephrologist
name: Prof. Dr. Pradip Kumar Dutta
description: Prof. Dr. Pradip Kumar Dutta is a Nephrologist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Nephrology), FCPS (Medicine), Training (Internal Medicine). He is a Former Professor in the Department of Nephrology at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Max Hospital & Diagnostic, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Pradip Kumar Dutta at Max Hospital & Diagnostic, Chittagong is 2pm to 5pm (Monday).

title: Cardiologist
name: Dr. A.K. Boshak
description: Dr. A.K. Boshak is a Cardiologist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Cardiology). He is a Associate Professor in the Department of Cardiology at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Chittagong.Practicing hour of Dr. A.K. Boshak at Popular Diagnostic Center, Chittagong is 5pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

title: Physical Medicine
name: Dr. Md. Abu Taslim
specialist: Pain, Paralysis, Rheumatology, Arthritis, Physical Medicine Specialist
description: Dr. Md. Abu Taslim is a Physical Medicine Specialist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Physical Medicine). He is a Associate Professor in the Department of Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation at BGC Trust Medical College, Chittagong. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at CSCR Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Abu Taslim at CSCR Hospital, Chittagong is 7pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

title: Gynecologist
name: Prof. Dr. Shahanara Chowdhury
description: Prof. Dr. Shahanara Chowdhury is a Gynecologist in Chittagong. Her qualification is MBBS, FCPS (OBGYN), DMEd (UK). She is a Professor in the Department of Gynecology & Obstetrics at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Royal Hospital & Bellevue Chittagong. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Shahanara Chowdhury at Royal Hospital & Bellevue Chittagong is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

title: Hematologist
name: Prof. Dr. Anupam Barua
specialist: Hematology (Blood Diseases, Blood Cancer) & Medicine Specialist
description: Prof. Dr. Anupam Barua is a Hematologist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Hematology), MD (Internal Medicine). He is a Professor in the Department of Hematology at Cox's Bazar Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Max Hospital & Diagnostic, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Anupam Barua at Max Hospital & Diagnostic, Chittagong is 5pm to 7pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).
